bill_title: designate certain counties as economic improvement areas and to establish the interest rate for revolving economic development initiative loans in economic improvement areas.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to designate certain counties as economic improvement areas and to establish the interest rate for revolving economic development initiative loans in economic improvement areas. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-16G be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The commissioner of the Governor's Office of Economic Development, using the latest data compiled by the United States Census Bureau, shall designate the ten counties that have the lowest per capita income in the state as economic improvement areas. Section 2. That chapter 1-16G be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: When determining to offer a loan to an eligible applicant, the commissioner of the Governor's Office of Economic Development shall give preference to proposed operations that create jobs in the retail or service industries. Section 3. That chapter 1-16G be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: An eligible applicant who plans to conduct operations primarily in an economic improvement area shall be charged an interest rate of 0 percent.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
